name: Shoot Them Freaking Zombies
description:
My first project using Godot. A top down 2d shooter with endless zombies spawning around you and local high score for you to beat.

it's more of learning project and prototype I will be working on it adding different enemies, weapons, levels and mechanics as time goes on.

music and art made by me

sound effects from https://opengameart.org/
https://opengameart.org/content/picked-coin-echo-2 https://opengameart.org/content/grunt
https://opengameart.org/content/zombie-sound https://opengameart.org/content/punches-hits-swords-and-squishes
https://opengameart.org/content/futuristic-smg
